tool_description: Additional Registration Attributes Magento Extension allows you to add custom fields on user sign-up form.
name: Additional Registration Attributes Magento Extension
title: Additional Registration Attributes Magento Extension

api_list.name: /http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/advance-custom-registration-form-fields-customer-attributes.html/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simonwalker-Additional-Registration-Attributes-Magento-Extension-v1.p.rapidapi.com/http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/advance-custom-registration-form-fields-customer-attributes.html/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simonwalker-Additional-Registration-Attributes-Magento-Extension-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
